mainText: My very heart-felt condolences to Steve's family, friends and to all those at Apple who worked with him and loved him. As someone who has grown up on Mac's from the first Apple Mac in about 1986 (in Australia), I have benefited from Steve's extraordinary creative genius and vision. I am so very sorry that he is gone but so very thankful for all that he did during his life. He is an inspiration to me.
author: Nicole
